module Env

: sig

Environment variables (generic support code)

#
type t
#
val create : string array -> t
#
val put : t -> Support.Common.varname -> string -> unit
#
val get : t -> Support.Common.varname -> string option
#
val get_exn : t -> Support.Common.varname -> string
#
val unset : t -> Support.Common.varname -> unit
#
val to_array : t -> string array
end
